name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in **React**, **microservices**, and **cloud technologies** including **GCP**. Skilled in **Scala** for robust backend development and experienced with **OpenAPI** for seamless API integration. Adept at designing **distributed systems** and implementing **testable code** practices to ensure code quality and reliability.
Well-versed in deploying applications using **BigQuery** and **Pub/Sub**, with a strong foundation in **agile methodologies** and **cross-functional collaboration** to facilitate workflow efficiency.
A strong advocate for **UX design**, utilizing tools like **Figma** to enhance user experience. Proven track record in delivering solutions aligned with compliance standards while leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, alongside hands-on experience in developing AI/ML-powered platforms and setting up CI/CD pipelines on **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Scala** and **React (17-18)** to design and implement full-stack platforms, ensuring optimal performance and a seamless user experience across healthcare and fintech sectors.

Employed **GCP** services such as **BigQuery** and **Pub/Sub** to enhance data processing capabilities and support distributed systems architecture.

Led the development and integration of microservices ensuring adherence to **OpenAPI** specifications, facilitating cross-functional collaboration with DevOps and UX design teams.

Executed agile methodologies, driving iterations and improvements based on sprint feedback while fostering a proactive development environment.

Assured delivery of testable code by implementing unit and integration tests using frameworks like **Jest** and **PyTest**, achieving over **90%** code coverage across projects.

Crafted user-centric designs and interfaces through tools like **Figma**, enhancing the overall UX and ensuring designs were easily translatable into functional applications.

Managed CI/CD workflows in **GCP** environments for efficient, automated deployments and updates, reducing time to deployment by **30%**.

Conducted code reviews and shared best practice sessions, promoting a culture of continuous learning and improvement across development teams.

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into scalable software solutions, directly impacting project timelines and deliverables.

Developed advanced data visualization tools using **D3.js** and **Chart.js**, contributing to real-time analytics for operational KPIs that improved financial decision-making processes.

• Leveraged **microservices** architecture by implementing **Scala** for backend development, significantly improving system scalability and robustness in high-volume environments.
• Designed and developed interactive applications utilizing **React** (18) and **Figma** for UX design, ensuring user-friendly interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Implemented **cloud** solutions using **GCP** for deploying applications, optimizing resource usage across multiple services and ensuring high availability.
• Created and managed APIs compliant with **OpenAPI** specifications, enhancing documentation and testing, which led to a **30%** reduction in integration time.
• Collaborated cross-functionally in an **agile** environment, leading to a **25%** increase in team productivity through effective communication and alignment of objectives.
• Developed real-time data processing capabilities using **Pub/Sub** and **BigQuery**, facilitating instant access to critical data for decision making in operational processes.
• Produced **testable code** through rigorous unit and integration testing, ensuring reliability and maintainability of the application over time.
• Spearheaded initiatives to enhance UX design practices, leading to a **15%** improvement in user satisfaction ratings through enhanced interface design and usability.
• Contributed to **distributed systems** projects, utilizing frameworks and practices that enable asynchronous operations and increase system resilience.
• Actively engaged in code reviews and mentorship, fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement within the engineering team.

Utilized **Scala** to design robust microservices for a scalable e-commerce platform architecture, ensuring high availability and response efficiency across services.
Collaborated cross-functionally using **agile** methodologies to enhance project sprint outcomes, leading towards successful feature deployments and system improvements based on team feedback.
Developed dynamic, user-friendly interfaces with **React** (version 18) combined with **Figma** for UX design, resulting in optimized user experience and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Implemented efficient data processing workflows leveraging **GCP** with **BigQuery** and **Pub/Sub**, enhancing the performance of data retrieval and analysis for decision-making processes by **50%**.
Engineered fault-tolerant and **distributed systems** ensuring minimal downtime and performance peaks during traffic surges, improving system reliability.
Applied **OpenAPI** specifications for documentation and design of APIs, enhancing developer experience and promoting adherence to standards.
Created and maintained **testable code** through rigorous testing practices, contributing to a **30%** decrease in production bugs and increasing overall code quality.
Designed and deployed cloud-native applications with a focus on **microservices**, optimizing performance and facilitating easier maintenance across varying components.
Fostered proactive communication within teams to troubleshoot and support application developments, aligning reports from user feedback to enhance overall system functionality.
